item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Bypassing airport security via SQL injection (1026 points | 238 comments)
2. The secret inside One Million Checkboxes (169 points | 11 comments)
3. Google Closure has been archived (23 points | 10 comments)
4. Anthropic's Prompt Engineering Interactive Tutorial (23 points | 3 comments)
5. Ever used Google Chrome in incognito mode? You could be entitled to up to $5k (61 points | 33 comments)
6. JPMorgan's Python training for business analysts and traders (12 points | 4 comments)
7. Chrome is entrenching third-party cookies that will mislead users (248 points | 117 comments)
8. Launch HN: CodeViz (YC S24) – Visual maps of your codebase in VS Code (93 points | 31 comments)
9. Elasticsearch is open source, again (220 points | 141 comments)
10. Poly (YC S22) is hiring Rust experts in SF to build "Arc browser for files" ( | hide)
11. Raspberry Pi Pico does line rate 100M Ethernet (167 points | 23 comments)
12. Can solar costs keep shrinking? (193 points | 315 comments)
13. Show HN: A discovery-focused search engine for Hacker News (103 points | 22 comments)
14. Dawn of a new era in Search: Balancing innovation, competition, and public good (179 points | 44 comments)
15. Judge rules $400M algorithmic system illegally denied Medicaid benefits (262 points | 68 comments)
16. Launch HN: Patchwork (YC S24) – Automatically add structured logs to your code (71 points | 23 comments)
17. From Opium to Saffron, the Ancients Knew a Thing or Two About Drugs (8 points | discuss)
18. OpenAI is good at unminifying code (807 points | 277 comments)
19. Judges rule Big Tech's free ride on Section 230 is over (279 points | 328 comments)
20. Smart mask for exhaled breath condensate harvesting and analysis (14 points | 1 comment)
21. How I learned to stop worrying and love userspace networking (131 points | 27 comments)
22. Show HN: An open-source, local-first Webflow for your own app (157 points | 43 comments)
23. Hawai'i-Issued Real IDs Can Be Added to Apple Wallet Beginning August 28 (53 points | 64 comments)
24. Show HN: Homemade automated solar concentrator (245 points | 63 comments)
25. Floating points between zero and one (70 points | 49 comments)
26. Rescuing songs that record labels forgot existed (148 points | 23 comments)
27. Web Design Museum (151 points | 31 comments)
28. OpenVMS x86_64 at the Edge (16 points | 5 comments)
29. Air Con: $1697 for an on/off switch (1728 points | 447 comments)
30. Frank Lloyd Wright's Only Skyscraper Is Heading to Auction (12 points | 2 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
